message.content:
1. There was a surgery performed.
2. There was a PVB group involved in the study.
3. The first analgesic requirement time was measured after the surgery.
4. The median first analgesic requirement time was prolonged in the PVB group.
5. The prolongation of the first analgesic requirement time in the PVB group was statistically significant.
6. The statistical significance of the prolongation was P<0.0001.

messages.content:
Statement: After surgery, the median (25th–75th percentile) first analgesic requirement time was prolonged in the PVB group in statistically significant fashion (P<0.0001).

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
